Package ru.nsu.g.solovev5.m.gradebook.semester.subject.grades

Interface Grade

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreditGrade, DifferentiatedGrade
public sealed interface Grade permits DifferentiatedGrade, CreditGrade
A university grade.

As a grade should be either differentiated or pass/fail the interface permits only 2 realization.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of this grade, that should be written in a credit book.
      Returns:
      the name of this grade

    • isPositive

      boolean isPositive()
      Determines whether this grade is positive(i.e. the student can continue his studies) or not.
      Returns:
      true if this is positive, false otherwise

    • isDifferentiated

      boolean isDifferentiated()
      Determines whether this grade is differentiated or not.
      Returns:
      true if this grade is differentiated, false otherwise

    • getNumeric

      default int getNumeric()
      Returns the numeric value of a differentiated grade. If the grade is not differentiated throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Returns:
      the numeric value of this grade
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if this grade is not differentiated
